changeSet.createView: Select T1.LegalApplicantId, T1.LegalId, T1.Title, T1.PropertyOwnersName, T1.Age, T1.Relationshiptype, T1.IDtype, T1.IDNo, T1.Remarks, T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, t2.doctypedesc iDTypeName, t3.saluationDesc titleName, customerId FROM LegalApplicantDetails_Temp T1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.IDtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT join BMTSalutations t3 on t3.salutationCode = t1.Title UNION ALL Select T1.LegalApplicantId, T1.LegalId, T1.Title, T1.PropertyOwnersName, T1.Age, T1.Relationshiptype, T1.IDtype, T1.IDNo, T1.Remarks, T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, t2.doctypedesc iDTypeName, t3.saluationDesc titleName, customerId FROM LegalApplicantDetails T1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.IDtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT join BMTSalutations t3 on t3.salutationCode = t1.Title WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LegalApplicantDetails_Temp WHERE LegalApplicantId = T1.LegalApplicantId)

changeSet.author: DurgaPrasad G
changeSet.createView: Select T1.LegalApplicantId, T1.LegalId, T1.Title, T1.PropertyOwnersName, T1.Age, T1.Relationshiptype, T1.IDtype, T1.IDNo, T1.Remarks, T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, t2.doctypedesc iDTypeName, t3.saluationDesc titleName, customerId FROM LegalApplicantDetails T1 LEFT JOIN bmtdocumenttypes t2 ON t1.IDtype = t2.doctypecode LEFT join BMTSalutations t3 on t3.salutationCode = t1.Title

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM SMTPARAMETERS where SYSPARMCODE = 'ESFB_LEGAL_DETAIL_MODT_RMDT_DOC_ROLES'; INSERT INTO SMTPARAMETERS VALUES ('ESFB_LEGAL_DETAIL_MODT_RMDT_DOC_ROLES', ' legal detail documents modt and rmdt genarated roles', 'String', 1, 'AHF_LEGAL_DI_VERIFICATION', 200, 0, NULL, NULL,' legal detail documents modt and rmdt genarated roles', 1, 1000, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'Approved', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0);
